data_table.description: Clinical Chemistry Lab, Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: CHMBFLAG
variable.description: 1= if form is present [Clinical Chemistry Lab, exam 2]

variable.name: CHMB03
variable.description: Transport condition. Q3 [Clinical Chemistry Lab, exam 2]

variable.name: CHMB04
variable.description: Specimen appearance. Q4 [Clinical Chemistry Lab, exam 2]

variable.name: CHMB05
variable.description: Sodium (mmol Per L) Dec Pt Req. Q5 [Clinical Chemistry Lab, exam 2]

variable.name: CHMB06
variable.description: Potassium (mmol Per L) Dec Pt Req. Q6 [Clinical Chemistry Lab, exam 2]

variable.name: CHMB07
variable.description: Glucose (mg Per dL) Dec Pt Req. Q7 [Clinical Chemistry Lab, exam 2]

variable.name: CHMB08
variable.description: Creatinine (mg Per dL) Dec Pt Req. Q8 [Clinical Chemistry Lab, exam 2]

variable.name: CHMB09
variable.description: Magnesium (mEq Per L) Dec Pt Req. Q9 [Clinical Chemistry Lab, exam 2]

variable.name: CHMB10
variable.description: Uric acid (mg Per dL) Dec Pt Req. Q10 [Clinical Chemistry Lab, exam 2]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Clinical Chemistry Lab, exam 2]
